impact-statement: Enhancing mitochondrial Ca<sup>2+</sup> uptake effectively suppresses aberrant Ca<sup>2+</sup> induced arrhythmogenic events in zebrafish, mouse and human cardiomyocytes, demonstrating a critical role for mitochondria in the regulation of cardiac rhythmicity.
